message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle!
You went up, I'll meet you halfway again!
You're still too generous, I'll take more this time!
You took more, I'll take a bit more too!
You're getting desperate, I'll take most of it now!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting away with everything!
You're running out of time, I'm taking what I can get!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're getting close to the end, but I'm not done yet!
I'll give you most of it, but I'm not giving up yet!
Last chance, take it or leave it!
